body: Note that despite the claims of this user, this is probably still occurring today in different slack channels for only the higher members of the powermod cabal. The reason for this is that as reddit becomes larger, they need more useful idiots to do the actual work for them while they power trip, so not every default mod is actually in on the agenda anymore.

title: Former default mod literally just admitted that the admins and default mods used to hang out together in IRC and other private chat rooms!!!!
